title: Peter Schjeldahl, New York Art Critic With a Poet’s Voice, Dies at 80
description: Writing for The New Yorker and The Village Voice, he was an indispensable guide to art on view, both old and new.
dc:creator: William Grimes
media:description: Peter Schjeldahl with his wife, Brooke Alderson, in 1981. Mr. Schjeldahl wrote about New York’s art world with undiminished enthusiasm for more than half a century.
